A: Though they're green on the outside, they're red on the inside.

1_17q6Zhf7PFjrY3ddySK2F78JhAH3FVhmWr.body:
Hillary, the pathological liar, the enabler of Bill's sexcapades and the Butcher of Benghazi sold access to the State Department to the highest bidder through the Clinton Crime Foundation using her private e-mail server. How could anyone vote for this whore of Babylon? Moreover, Hillary is suffering from late stage Parkinson's disease. She's been given about a year to live. She is truly unfit to be President. Who do you want a blood clot away from the Presidency? It certainly isn't Tim Kaine.
Frankly, how could anyone vote for any Democrats at all after they railroaded Obamacare through Congress and forced 70% of the American people to pay for it whether they wanted it or not? Coming soon, huge premium increases to keep this disaster afloat. 
VOTE TRUMP! MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!
VOTE REPUBLICAN! MAKE THE DEMOCRATS PAY FOR THEIR ARROGANCE!

2_1Cxt2k3farSSee7HTkJKJ7eCTKxfFGNXe6.body:
That woman has no shame and no integrity. Even if she was found eating a live baby, she still wouldn't step down.
Her campaign is about sneaking Tim Kaine into the Presidency when Hiliary can no longer do the job, as he was picked to be her running mate well over a year ago.
